page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW.
page.content: This area consists mainly of highly mechanised{arable farmland}with some cattle grazing and two small, mainly coniferous plantations. Most of the farms were run by managers who were, as a rule, rather reticent. There is one village with extensive {new housing}and two small hamlets - one with a{Saxon Church}- little changed over the centuries. Otherwise housing, apart from a block of 4 council houses, consists of scattered old cottages and several{listed {farmhouses. There is a thriving{PYO fruit farm,}a growing{leisure fishing}enterprise, and there are many{social activities in the village hall and the Pub.The facilities are negligible and the resididents mostly{commute to work. {Ecology and Conservation}are important considerations.
